## vision\_v1p2beta1.Schema$GoogleCloudVisionV1p2beta1Image interface

Client image to perform Google Cloud Vision API tasks over.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Schema$GoogleCloudVisionV1p2beta1Image 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [content](./vision.vision_v1p2beta1.schema_googlecloudvisionv1p2beta1image.content.md) | string \| null | Image content, represented as a stream of bytes. Note: As with all <code>bytes</code> fields, protobuffers use a pure binary representation, whereas JSON representations use base64. |
|  [source](./vision.vision_v1p2beta1.schema_googlecloudvisionv1p2beta1image.source.md) | [Schema$GoogleCloudVisionV1p2beta1ImageSource](./vision.vision_v1p2beta1.schema_googlecloudvisionv1p2beta1imagesource.md) | Google Cloud Storage image location, or publicly-accessible image URL. If both <code>content</code> and <code>source</code> are provided for an image, <code>content</code> takes precedence and is used to perform the image annotation request. |
